prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a colossal Russian wrestler, massive beard, chest hair, shaved head, muscular physique, intense expression, 8k dslr photo, arena lighting
feature_prompt: detailed skin wrinkles and pores, extreme visible muscle definition, realistic body hair texture on beard and chest, textured red wrestling trunks fabric, sharp focus
